name: Add-on Popularity
query:
SELECT 
    addon.`item` AS "Add-On Type:Link/Item:200",
    COUNT(*) AS "Sold Count:Int:120"
FROM 
    `tabAirplane Ticket` ticket
INNER JOIN 
    `tabAirplane Ticket Add-on Item` addon
    ON addon.parent = ticket.name
GROUP BY 
    addon.`item`
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(*) DESC;
